text: Nyengo wu Bayuda, nyengo wu zinzo zi kapu7.2 Nyengo wu zinzo zi kapuÂ : wuba zingilanga nana di bilumbu. Bayuda baba kembilanga wawu ku Yelusalemi mu Thebukulu moyo mu diambu banzingila mu zinzo zikapu mu dikanga bu batotuka mu tsi yi Ezipite. Bayuda babo baba mu zungaki Palesitine baba kuizanga ku Yelusalemi mu thangu wu nyengo beni., wuba nduka.
